headline: Crusoe, the AI Factory Company, Raising $1.375 Billion at a Valuation Above $10 Billion to Power the Future of AI Infrastructure
summary: Mubadala Capital and Valor Equity Partners co-lead funding to scale Crusoe’s vertically integrated AI infrastructure platformSAN FRANCISCO and DENVER, Oct. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Crusoe, the AI factory company, today announced the initial closing of its anticipated $1.375 billion Series E round, bringing the company's expected valuation to over $10 billion. The oversubscribed round was co-led by technology investors Valor Equity Partners and Mubadala Capital, with participation from 137 Ve

headline: Super Micro (SMCI) Slashes 8.7% as Revenues Seen to Fall
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Slump Amid Wall Street Cheer; 2 Hit Rock Bottom. Super Micro Computer, Inc. (NASDAQ:SMCI) is one of the worst performers on Thursday. headline: How Recent Analyst Upgrades Are Changing the Story for Super Micro Computer
summary: Super Micro Computer stock recently saw a modest increase in its consensus analyst price target, rising from $50.06 to $50.59. This adjustment reflects growing analyst confidence in the company's near-term sales trajectory and optimism about its competitive positioning. Stay tuned to discover how you can monitor ongoing shifts in analyst outlooks and keep ahead of the evolving Super Micro narrative.
